pullRequest.title: Issue #5272 Clean up LoginServices and LoginModules
pullRequest.bodyText:
Closes #5272
This issue started out as a way to make the UserStore and PropertyUserStore more re-usable, but has become more of a clean-up of the LoginService and LoginModule code to remove unnecessary complication and duplication.

commit.message:
Issue #5272 Clean up LoginServices and LoginModules

Signed-off-by: Jan Bartel <janb@webtide.com>

commit.message:
Issue #5272 Remove unneeded o.e.j.jaas.spi.User class

Signed-off-by: Jan Bartel <janb@webtide.com>

Issue #5272 Make o.e.j.security.User class inner to UserStore

Signed-off-by: Jan Bartel <janb@webtide.com>

nodes.bodyText: You could make this field final.
This should probably have a LOG.isDebugEnabled() check.
You could use roles.forEach instead of getting a stream.

The JDBCUserPrincipal class below could be static.
Also the JDBCLoginService constructors all say they throw IOException but none of them actually do, so maybe that declaration could be removed as well.
This is done in the constructor as well.

commit.message:
Issue #5272 More cleanup; fixed demo-jaas.mod

Signed-off-by: Jan Bartel <janb@webtide.com>
